description: Taste one of the most delectable fig&nbsp;champagne cocktails! Simply muddle fresh figs with brown sugar and a splash of lemon in a mixing glass. Once you've made a syrupy fig compote, pour it over crushed ice and top with bubbly prosecco.
keywords: Brown Sugar Fig Bubbly Cocktail Recipe
How To Brown Sugar Fig Bubbly
name: Brown Sugar Fig Bubbly
recipeIngredient: 10 to 12 Ripe figs, trimmed and sliced

recipeInstructions.name: Combine the figs and brown sugar in the bottom of a big glass or jar. Add the lemon juice to the mixture.
recipeInstructions.text: Combine the figs and brown sugar in the bottom of a big glass or jar. Add the lemon juice to the mixture.

recipeInstructions.name: Mash and muddle the mixture with a cocktail muddler for about 5 minutes, or until the figs have broken down and the sauce is sticky. You can also remove huge portions of fig skin at this point.
recipeInstructions.text: Mash and muddle the mixture with a cocktail muddler for about 5 minutes, or until the figs have broken down and the sauce is sticky. You can also remove huge portions of fig skin at this point.

recipeInstructions.name: Fill the glass with ice and top with your fig mixture. You can split it evenly or use 2 to 3 tablespoons per glass.

recipeInstructions.name: Top each glass with prosecco, then add a sliced fig and serve.
